mapper.insert: insert into tb_reservation (user_seq, hospital_seq, doctor_seq, reserve_date, reserve_time, symptom) values (#{userSeq}, #{hospitalSeq}, #{doctorSeq}, #{reserveDate}, #{reserveTime}, #{symptom})
insert into tb_reservation_time(hospital_seq, doctor_seq, date, time) values(#{hospitalSeq}, #{doctorSeq}, #{date}, #{time})
mapper.select: select * from tb_reservation r, tb_user u, tb_doctor d where r.user_seq = u.user_seq and r.doctor_seq = d.doctor_seq and r.hospital_seq = #{hospitalSeq} and r.reserve_date = #{reserveDate} order by cast(r.reserve_time as unsigned) asc
select r.*, d.doctor_name from tb_reservation r, tb_doctor d where r.doctor_seq = d.doctor_seq and user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.update: update tb_reservation set reserve_status = 3 where reserve_status = 1 and reserve_date < now()
mapper.select: select stat.cnt from (select date_format(reserve_date,'%Y-%m') month, count(*) cnt from tb_reservation where hospital_seq = #{hospitalSeq} group by month) stat where stat.month = #{dateStr}

select * from (select date_format(reserve_date,'%Y-%m') month, count(*) cnt from tb_reservation where hospital_seq = #{hospitalSeq} group by month) stat where stat.month between #{startMonth} and #{endMonth}

select stat.cnt from (select date_format(reserve_date,'%Y-%m') month, count(*) cnt from tb_reservation r, tb_user u where r.user_seq = u.user_seq and r.hospital_seq = #{hospitalSeq} and (year(now()) - (mid(u.birth, 1, 2)+1900)) between #{start} and #{end}) stat where stat.month = #{dateStr}
